justification: "In the first session, participants … completed an operation span task (Turner & Engle, 1989) as a measure of working memory capacity… Participants' working memory capacity was calculated based on the OSPAN score – the sum of the length of all correctly recalled spans."

measured_by: accuracy in the Mandarin tone category learning task (training blocks)
justification: "We examined the extent to which WM capacity … was associated with performance in the category learning task… average accuracy across a block was the outcome variable."
construct: Mandarin tone speech category learning accuracy

measured_by: accuracy in the generalization block without feedback
justification: "We will assess generalization in each session by presenting learners with novel stimuli spoken by novel talkers that they do not encounter during training… learners were successful at generalizing their knowledge to the new speakers."

measured_by: drift diffusion model evidence-accumulation rate (drift rate μ)
justification: "Efficiency of Evidence Accumulation. We predict that more WM resources may enable learners to acquire information from the stimulus more efficiently… The rate of evidence accumulation reflects the quality of information extracted from the stimulus, with faster rates reflecting a more efficient evidence accumulation process."

measured_by: drift diffusion model decision threshold (boundary parameter)
justification: "Response Caution… is reflected in the decision threshold. Higher thresholds reflect more cautious responses that need more evidence before a decision is made, whereas lower thresholds reflect more impulsive responses based on less evidence."
